name: Tile Eco
description:
I recommend Fullscreen and each playthrough will have a different amount of each tile. For a faster pace experience, try the game with Turn Based off (you have to set it each time you restart).

(If the soundtrack doesn't play, refresh the page)

R = Restart

Escape = Pause

It's a cute little game I'm really proud of making! I'm 17 and made it alone, I did however get free assets for the Icons and Sounds. But they really pull everything together! It's been a great experience I'd love to do again!

Any and all feedback is appreciated!

Thanks for playing!

Here's the chances for those interested:

2/5 chance to get a Plant tile

2/5 chance to get a Water tile

1/5 chance to get a Sun tile

Each Sun tile lasts 6-9 turns

If Playing with Turn Based turned off

Suns last 30-50 seconds
